game_description: Iron Rebellion is all about the immersive experience of being a mech pilot. We want players to feel truly locked and loaded inside a mechanical titan and give them all of the buttons, levers, and ammunition they need to dominate the battlefield. Current Features include: *Immersive physics based sim controls and buttons * Competitive 4v4 multiplayer * 3 mech classes, Scout, Assault, Heavy * 7 weapons * 6 maps * 3 game modes * AI Bots * Advanced movement and locomotion you need to feel to understand! Why Early Access Our primary goal for early access is to expand our team, to speed up production, and to flesh out the rest of the games core elements. With your support and the advent of VR we can show the world what a mech game can truly become! How long will the game stay in EA * V0.9 by the middle of 2022 * V1.0 out by the end of 2022 to start of 2023.
review_1: Absolutely captivating! Iron Rebellion is an exceptional VR game that transports players to a thrilling steampunk universe. With its stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, I was completely engrossed from the very beginning. The diverse range of challenges, from epic battles to intricate puzzles, kept me engaged and entertained for hours on end. The attention to detail in the game world is remarkable, making each encounter feel authentic and exhilarating. The seamless controls and smooth locomotion made for a comfortable and enjoyable experience. Without a doubt, Iron Rebellion is a must-play for VR enthusiasts, offering an unforgettable adventure in an extraordinary realm. Wrote by chat GPT.
review_2: Iron Rebellion gives the dream of piloting a big heavy mech in a Mechwarrior styled tour de force with the most indepth and interactive cockpit and control scheme I have EVER witnessed in a mech game since Mech Warrior 2 on PC. The tight controls, amazing attention to detail and overall gameplay and fun factor are through the roof. While this is still in beta, it does not feel rushed or thrown together with electrical tape and shattered dreams. The team behind this game did a BANG UP JOB. As owner of the coveted Steel Battalion on the OG XBOX with the huge controller, this game was an evolutionary jump up to being able to fully immerse myself in a world filled with giant mechs thundering across a wide open map while blowning up stuff and jump boosting from place to place. This is an experience NOT to be missed and I have HIGH hopes this will come to playstation VR 2 hell I would buy this game for 50 bucks if it did! Cannot stress how great the game is, I have not tried the co op missions but I can see myself jumping into the cockpit of my mech a lot and spending time in the world of Iron Rebellion. Nuff said.
review_3: Let me start by thanking the Developers for making such an awesome game. Totally immersive battles put you in the cockpit of a giant m e c h. I prefer the heavy with twin Spitfires. My call sign is HAWKSTEAL. Look for me in the game as I play as often as I can. Four versus four is a totally satisfying feeling piloting one of these machines. I prefer Deathmatch on the junkyard map. Give it a try it is a must-have highly recommend this game you won't be disappointed. Three classes of mechs and a boatload of weapons to customize your layout to suit every sort of playstyle. The heavy is slow and tanky but is hard to kill as it has the highest HP points in the game. Give it a try and look for me in the game.
review_5: And it seems like it's only going to get better with new updates.
